definition: (obsolete) a combination of elements (of dryness and warmth or of the four humors) that was once believed to determine a person's health and temperament, to give a certain color to
details:
noun
- (obsolete) a combination of elements (of dryness and warmth or of the four humors) that was once believed to determine a person's health and temperament
- texture and appearance of the skin of the face
- the coloring of a person's face
= synonyms: skin color, skin colour
- a point of view or general attitude or inclination
= example: a point of view or general attitude or inclination
- a combination that results from coupling or interlinking
= example: a combination that results from coupling or interlinking
verb
- to give a certain color to
= example: to give a certain color to
